mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_test (schedule_no, create_user_id, cutline, create_dt, time, test_dt, delete_yn) VALUES (#{T.scheduleNo}, #{T.createUserId}, #{T.cutline}, NOW(), #{T.time}, #{T.testDt}, #{T.deleteYn})
mapper.select: SELECT test_no, schedule_no, create_user_id, cutline, create_dt, update_dt, time, test_dt, delete_yn FROM tbl_test;
SELECT test_no, schedule_no, create_user_id, cutline, create_dt, update_dt, time, test_dt, delete_yn FROM tbl_test WHERE test_no = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_test SET schedule_no = #{T.scheduleNo}, create_user_id = #{T.createUserId}, cutline = #{T.cutline}, update_dt = #{T.updateDt}, time = #{T.time}, test_dt = #{T.testDt}, delete_yn = #{T.deleteYn} WHERE test_no = #{T.testNo}
